amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase the Anadromous Fish Screen Program by $5 million for the purposes of making repairs to existing equipment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
